arts.ttl: Man United's Â£62m target Matheus Cunha hits out at Wolves fan channel over deleted post on Instagram which declared he would 'follow his dreams'
arts.sum: Cunha has been in red-hot form this season, scoring 15 goals in 29 games across all competitions, and he is all but certain to move on this summer.

arts.ttl: Matheus Cunha clashes with Wolves fans after deleting eye-catching statement
arts.sum: Matheus Cunha deleted a post on Instagram - but not before it had been screenshotted and widely shared among unhappy Wolves fans, sparking an argument on social media

arts.ttl: Man United eye Matheus Cunha but must sell before being able to afford Wolves' asking price for 15-goal star
arts.sum: Manchester United are on a long list of Premier League clubs who are interested in signing 25-year-old Brazilian forward Matheus Cunha from Wolves this summer.
